title: Pothole on Main Street causing traffic issues
description: Large pothole near the intersection of Main Street and 5th Avenue has been causing traffic congestion and vehicle damage for the past week.

title: Street lights not working in residential area
description: Multiple street lights in the Greenwood residential area have been non-functional for over two weeks, creating safety concerns.

title: Illegal dumping near community park
description: Construction debris and household waste have been illegally dumped near the entrance of Community Park.

title: Water main leak on Elm Street
description: Significant water leak from main pipe causing flooding on Elm Street sidewalk.

title: Graffiti vandalism on public building
description: Extensive graffiti on the exterior walls of the Public Library requires immediate cleanup.
